duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the configuration, customization, and maintenance of the CRM platform.
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to the CRM system.
Assist in data cleansing, migration, and integration efforts to ensure data accuracy and consistency within the CRM system.
Work with senior engineers to implement customizations, workflows, and automation within the CRM system.
Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather requirements and understand their needs for CRM system improvements.
Document technical processes, configurations, and customizations within the CRM system.
Provide training and support to end-users on CRM system usage, best practices, and troubleshooting.
Participate in regular system maintenance, updates, and upgrades to ensure the CRM system's reliability and security.
Stay up to date with industry trends and best practices related to CRM systems.

education_certification.credential: A bachelor's degree and at least 3 years experience as a CRM Engineer or similar role (additional experience may be substituted in lieu of a degree)
